TopicTitle: How to hack file for outpost "new construction" date?

Articles.Content:
I have an outpost that for some reason isn't meeting the 'constructed after contract accepted' flag for a new base going to Pol.   I've checked all my save files and confirmed it was built after the contract was accepted.

How can I 'hack' the system to set that flag?
Probably the easiest thing to do is to autocomplete the contract in the debug menu (Alt+F12, Contracts, complete).
